item.title: Enable CORS in Rails
item.description: You have to explicitly allow Cross Origin Resource Sharing to access your Rails API from another domain, like if you have a separate javascript frontend and a Rails backend. This was the best link I found: https://medium.com/ruby-daily/understanding-cors-when-using-ruby-on-rails-as-an-api-f086dc6ffc41 No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header is present on the requested resource. is the error message you get when you try to make CORS requests without enabling it. Enable CORS add gem 'rack-cors' to Gemfile bundle install # config/initializers/cors.
